CDQ001.label: SP ever had pain or discomfort in chest
CDQ001.text: {Have you/Has SP} ever had any pain or discomfort in {your/her/his} chest?
CDQ001.target: Both males and females 40 YEARS - 150 YEARS

CDQ002.label: SP get it walking uphill or in a hurry
CDQ002.text: {Do you/Does she/Does he} get it when {you/she/he} walk uphill or hurry?
CDQ002.target: Both males and females 40 YEARS - 150 YEARS

CDQ003.label: During an ordinary pace on level ground
CDQ003.text: {Do you/Does she/Does he} get it when {you/she/he} walk at an ordinary pace on level ground?
CDQ003.target: Both males and females 40 YEARS - 150 YEARS

CDQ004.label: If so does SP continue or slow down
CDQ004.text: What {do you/does she/does he} do if {you/she/he} get it while {you/she/he} are walking? {Do you/Does she/Does he} stop or slow down or continue at the same pace?
CDQ004.target: Both males and females 40 YEARS - 150 YEARS

CDQ005.label: Does standing relieve pain/discomfort
CDQ005.text: If {you/she/he} stand still, what happens to it? Is the pain or discomfort relieved or not relieved?
CDQ005.target: Both males and females 40 YEARS - 150 YEARS

CDQ006.label: How soon is the pain relieved
CDQ006.text: How soon is the pain relieved? Would you say...
CDQ006.target: Both males and females 40 YEARS - 150 YEARS

CDQ008.label: Severe pain in chest lasting more than half hour
CDQ008.text: Was the pain in {your/her/his} chest severe, lasting for half an hour or more?
CDQ008.target: Both males and females 40 YEARS - 150 YEARS
